snippet.title: Open Alpha Trailer | Shadow of the Road
snippet.description:
Another Angle is excited to announce that in just one week you'll be able to participate in the open alpha of Shadow of the Road! Register to participate right now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1173980/Shadow_of_the_Road

Music by: Hayabusa by @exyz SENZO, MOMOKUSU IWATA - https://songshare.com/artist/x0wy9lti

Wishlist Shadow of the Road:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1173980/Shadow_of_the_Road
GOG: https://www.gog.com/en/game/shadow_of_the_road
EGS: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/shadow-of-the-road-42382d

Shadow of the Road social media:
Discord: https://discord.gg/7qRh8CYT
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/ShadowOfTheRoad/
X (formerly twitter): https://x.com/sotr_game
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sotr_game/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/shadowoftheroad
